game.name: Crazy Race
game.description: They can control pretty much any car, ranging from SUVs to exotic cars, to the perfection. The stakes are high. If you fail, you will go home without your car, but if you succeed, you will get invited into the real drifting elite. These guys are travelling around the world and enjoying extreme rides along the way. This is life you have always dreamed about. Lets take the risk!
